snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include an app for moving to better seats at a baseball park during the game, Apple criticizing Android smartphones...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include an app for moving to better seats at a baseball park during the game, Apple criticizing Android smartphones and a look at the growth of Internet technology in emerging nations.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Sonic Resurgent and Inside a Pebble Watch
